definition: abbr. for Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]

pinyin: yan3 se4 su4 ceng2 hei1 se4 su4 liu2

sentences.english: It is composed of hair follicle melanocytes are vivid.
sentences.chinese: 这是由毛囊中黑色素细胞不生动构成的。

sentences.english: Melanin helps the body filter out UV radiation, but it also can be harmful.
sentences.chinese: 黑色素可以帮助身体过滤紫外线，但它也有害处。

sentences.english: Therapeutic effects of squid ink melanin-Fe on iron deficiency anemia rats;
sentences.chinese: 目的比较鱿鱼墨黑色素和黑色素铁的自由基清除活性。

sentences.english: Therapeutic effects of squid ink melanin-Fe on iron deficiency anemia rats;
sentences.chinese: 目的比较鱿鱼墨黑色素和黑色素铁的自由基清除活性。

sentences.english: Well, this is what happens when you stop producing these melanin molecules.
sentences.chinese: 其实，这是这些黑色素停止生成的结果。

sentences.english: Multi-vitamin C, the promotion of melanin metabolism.
sentences.chinese: 多补充维生素C，促进黑色素代谢。

sentences.english: Clinique's proprietary formula with Black-Out Yeast Extract accelerates brightening.
sentences.chinese: 独有黑色素分散配方，加速肌肤亮泽效果。

sentences.english: “The number of melanoma diagnoses has increased in the hospital,” she says.
sentences.chinese: “该医院诊断的黑色素瘤患者人数有所增加，”她说。

sentences.english: Melanomas can appear even in areas of skin that do not get a lot of sun.
sentences.chinese: 黑色素瘤甚至会出现在不怎么能照到阳光的地方。

sentences.english: This is due to the fact that there is still some melanin that will remain unreacted.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为毛囊中仍残留一些没有被分解的黑色素。

sentences.english: This is responsible for the production of melanin which gives skin and hair its colour.
sentences.chinese: 该基因负责给我们的皮肤和毛发提供黑色素。

sentences.english: Most melanomas are black or brown.
sentences.chinese: 大多数黑色素瘤是黑色或褐色的。

sentences.english: This factor did not affect melanoma ratesamong low-income women.
sentences.chinese: 而这个因素对低收入女性患黑色素瘤的几率没有影响。

sentences.english: The pigment absorbs the radiation and protects cells from damage.
sentences.chinese: 黑色素可以吸收辐射，保护你的细胞不受损伤。

sentences.english: Ultraviolet(UV)resistance of Silky fowl Melanin was studied with its application to food.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了乌鸡黑色素的抗紫外线功能。

sentences.english: Your legs are the number one spot where melanoma strikes.
sentences.chinese: 你的双腿是最容易受黑色素瘤袭击的地方。

definition: stratum corneum (outermost layer of the skin)
